website_summaries.verdict: While they're a little generic-looking, the 1More Stylish True Wireless earphones deliver very good sound and decent battery life at an affordable price point.
pros: 1More Stylish True Wireless earphones sound excellent for a true wireless headphone, particularly for the price
They also have good battery life, fit pretty comfortably and maintain a reliable wireless connection
Simple one-button controls make them easy to operate
cons: Just calling them Stylish doesn't make them stylish
Noise-isolating design may be uncomfortable for some people

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in My ears
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly to have these do everything the rave reviews said they would...maybe it's just my funky ears but I could not get a solid seal and I tried every conceivable combo. I have no idea how anyone could workout with these. I am sticking with my tried but true Spirit X by Anker. They have a cord that sits on the back of your neck that I thought was bothersome until I tried these. Why doesn't one of the wireless head phone companies make the wireless with the wrap around for the ears but without the cord tying them together?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value Wireless Earbuds - Solid sound quality and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall great headphones Solid isolation, (would prefer a slightly tighter seal) Slightly boosted lows but not overly so And a good balanced sound stage and sound across the range. Battery life is closer to 5.5 -5.5hrs of continuous use but can approach 6hrs if you dial down the volume Takes about an hour to recharge from near dead the earbuds and about the same to recharge the case itself Here's hoping 1More releases a higher end earbuds with a touch pad and more HiFi sound profile (in the 150-200$ USD) without sacrificing too much in battery life and the other aspects that make this a Amazing buy for $99
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought these for the call quality, and they were great for the first week. But now they will hangup my calls all the time. It also loses connection constantly. I really want to return them. For the price, i expected these to not have such a problem. Another thing, THEY WILL NOT STAY IN MY EARS and I have perfectly normal ears but these do not stay in. I want to workout with them but that would be a very annoying task. Im very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DreDre

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were great, but after a week of use the left ear bud turns off randomly every time I use it then won’t pair again until you place it back in the pod. Not much use when your out on a jog! The two ear buds also played with the left bud on a slight delay once which was SO annoying! Requesting a return now.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT stay in the ear.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality doesn't matter when the earbud doesn't stay inserted in the ear. I've heard worse, but falling out on their own isn't a good feature.
customer_reviews.author: One time customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY AND DON'T BUY! Like most of the negative complaints, the left earbud crapped out on me. I have emailed now 4 times in a weeks span trying to excercise the warranty and they are avoiding me like the plague! Seems like a shady company that know they have a defective product. But Apple, Samsung, or at least someone with a reputable customer service background, not these guys! Update: So they replaced the headphones finally. Keeping at 3 stars with the hope the L ear doesn't crap out
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Slightly dull sound with no EQ
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears to be very good...however there were a few things I wasn't satisfied with...so I returned them. 1. After trying all the different ear piece combinations...they still did not feel secure enough for running. 2. They stick out of the ears further than what I was looking for. 3. There is no volume adjustments on the ear pieces (I knew that was not a feature on these...but decided after trying them that I want it). 4. The sound seemed slightly dull. I wish there was an app that would allow for the earphones to adjust the EQ some.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McElhenny

customer_reviews.title: Battery low!! Pls charge constantly!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if got a defective one!! Not holding charging only on L side!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Casey

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of earbuds I have purchased. The first pair one of the earbuds wouldn’t pair with my iPhone. This pair of earbuds has terrible sound quality. They have no volume and sound very tinny. In the write up for these earbuds it says they have deep base sound. Try no base at all. I’m returning these and getting a pair of Bose earbuds. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: G man

customer_reviews.title: Stunning sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, these headphones are amazing! They fit perfectly in my ears during any work out and provide high quality sound. I was a previous owner of apple headphones and can assure you I will never go back. The sleek design and sound is unmatched in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Acause

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: These lasted three months before the left bud volume would no longer get higher then 20%. The right bud volume is now too high in order to hear the left bud at all...essentially I have just ONE ear bud that works. This brand works as well as others for half the price and lasts about as long. My thinking now is to look at ear buds as simply a disposable commodity. Even the Bose I had lasted less then year before failure. They just are not designed for daily use in the gym were they can get wet due to sweat. Perhaps it's time to try ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: MUTT WONDERDUCK

customer_reviews.title: This deserved a long review
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting good quality earbuds. As soon as I opened the box I knew this company cared about their product. The box had a magnetized flap, and the buds were cushioned in 2 layers to accommodate their 3d size. One More included visual instructions for multi language. The bus themselves look more like jewelry than tech. Enough about that, these are well worth the cost. They are comfortable and easy to pair up. They deliver the bass I like but are not noise reducing so I dont feel like I'm in a cocoon. Well made, obvious quality, how about a set in sterling silver?
customer_reviews.author: Linda092

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but the best-sounding and -fitting true wireless earphones for $100 and under
customer_reviews.text: I tried several different brands of true wireless bluetooth earbuds (IEDs), spending more and more until I stopped with these. The benefit is that these provide XL ear canal fittings that don't fall out easily, block some external noise, and don't make the IEDs unable to charge. Less-expensive IEDs either sounded wrong or kept falling out of my big ear canals or got stuck in the charging position when I used XL ear canal inserts on the IEDs. These 1MORE IEDs sound adequately good. My reference headphones are high-end Stax and these don't compare to the Stax but do sound good enough for casual listening out in the world.
customer_reviews.author: dDave

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them. Trust Me.
customer_reviews.text: You won’t find a better wireless option for under $100. Period. The sound quality and battery performance far exceed anything else in this price point. If you’re a fan of the 1More Triple Driver (and who isn’t??) you’ll definitely like these, as they are tuned very similarly. Be sure you take a few minutes to experiment with the included additional ear hook and tip sizes. Using the proper sized tip will drastically impact the bass performance, and the properly sized ear hook will ensure a secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earbuds, love it!
customer_reviews.text: The design is very modern and stylish, wares very comfortable. Sound quality is way much better than Apple’s AirPods, battery life is much longer as well. Tried phone calls with other people, people over the other side told me my voice is crystal clear, and of course I’m very pleased with the sound quality as well. Ever since I bought this headphone, I’ve been wearing it everyday during my work. When I'm not playing music, it isolates some noise outside but I can still hear clearly when talking with other people. The connection is automatic when pulling the earbuds out of the charging case, and very quick connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Looks really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this earbuds because they look pretty before I really tried them. And thought maybe just would return them if the sound quality is not good. When i received and opened the package i felt surprised how nice and pretty it was, and the sound quality is good enough for me. I'm not professional one on the earbuds sound quality, i can't really tell too much difference among normal earbuds, good ones and professional ones. As long as it sounds nice and looks pretty, that's all for me. I am using them for everyday workout. If there will be some discount I don't mind to buy another color to match my different workout outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Liu

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: I got the ‘gold’ earbuds and they are an understated gold and not obnoxious which I REALLY like. Another great design thing is the button at the top of the ear bud which doesnt always get accidentally pressed when putting on or removing the earbuds (i prefer buttons over the touch feature of other earbuds) Ive had not issues with these falling out which is also a plus Sound quality: it is a decent sound, it doesnt necessarily feel ‘crisp’, but these are the best pair of earbuds I own. Call quality has been good, i havnt had any issues with disconnections or any muffled sounds
customer_reviews.author: Amish

customer_reviews.title: Better then my Bose, Mpows Pro and beats
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a replacement to my beats wireless pros (version 3) for some time and have picked up the Bose (cost me around 170), Mpows (cost me around 120) and now the 1mores. I wish i had picked up the 1mores first. They fit great (and since my left and right ear a different, that is saying a lot). Sound great and the fact that each ear can function independently is a great plus. If your looking for earbuds, and don’t want to break the bank, get these. Also i can not wait, until i can afford to buy the new noise-canceling model that is due to ship out soon. Howard
customer_reviews.author: Howard B. Richter

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money on a better brand
customer_reviews.text: These are Not worth it! They fall out of your ears and the volume is really low! They randomly unpair and are not water or sweat resistant! They won’t break but will shut off as soon as moisture hits them! (Not ideal for workouts or training) spend the extra money on a good pair or waste it on these and have to trash them. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Larenzo

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for 2 weeks, then didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set for my son for Christmas, used them about 2 weeks and now when we try powering them on anytime we power on the left earbud the right one makes a horrible noise and shuts off. Did all the typical troubleshooting (re-pairing to phone, tried a completely different phone, left on charger etc.) but same results. Called the company multiple times and get nothing but voicemail, never reached a live person. Emailed support thinking I might get an answer but they haven’t responded either. Returning them instead, oh well I really wanted to like them...
customer_reviews.author: BrianAx

customer_reviews.title: Too Good to be True..
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to use this product every day for one week. I say "attempted" because the earbuds would consistently not pair with my iPhone 7 or, if paired, would "unpair" (disconnect) for no reason. Importantly, I never have this problem with my Bose Quiet Comfort headphones. After a week of struggling with this product every day, I returned it to Amazon. The hope that earbuds ~30% cheaper than the Apple product would be just as good is dashed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Valancy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today. First impression I’m pretty happy with them. The sound is not too far off from my $300 IEMs. They feel pretty comfortable. The controls are pretty easy to use w/o jabbing it further into your ear like some tw buds. Going back a track is weird because it’s 3 clicks but if u a few seconds into a song it turns into 6 clicks to go back 1 song. I’ll try to update the review after a month or 2 and they have seen more use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ignoring the Entire World With These :) Best. Thing. I've. Ever. Bought.
customer_reviews.text: Best. Thing. I've. Ever. Bought. I can rock out on my own time and no one can hear. Not the best sound quality ever (vs. Beats) but for the price these are AMAZING and they are super tiny! With my hair down no one can even see them. Truly wireless, super comfortable (using size S earbuds out of XS, S, M, L). Bass is OK, not great, but good enough for what I need it for without destroying my eardrums - working out, working around the house, etc. Have yet to try out for phone calls. Happy so far. Excuse me while I add some more tunes to my playlists .... SO HAPPY WITH THESE!
customer_reviews.author: OhioBeachBum

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months, then sound problems
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that I've tried and have had the same issues with both. These were excellent earbuds in the first few months - wonderful sound, wonderful microphone, great battery life. However, after only 2 months, I am having issues where they don't sync up correctly, and go back and forth between left and right. And then the sound quality and microphone quality fails. They would be EXCELLENT if they wouldn't fail after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B. Utah

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these earbuds, but had to return them. Pairing was easy. Fit was good. However, when playing, there was a reoccurring static, crackling of noise that interrupted the music that was playing. When the static happened, sound floated or bounced from one bud to the other. I tried re-pairing and even played download music and it continued to act this way. When asked a question about this, the response l received from the sellers were I needed to "ground" myself! What? Never had this problem with other buds. Obviously, these buds were defective. I was not even offered a replacement. Well, I returned them because these were too expensive to just "take the loss."
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT STAY IN MY EARS no matter what!
customer_reviews.text: Look, the sound quality of these is excellent, among the best wireless earphones I've ever heard, but they won;t stay in my ears. I have tried everything, every size ear peice and the vry first time I used them while walking, one fell out - in thedark no less. I had to go back the next morning and by some miracle found it. I then tried adding some of those rubber ear hooks, but none would fit correctly. I even thought about tying them together with fishing line but then said forget it. They are great earphones, but if they won't stay in your ears while just walking - what good are they? Totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed E. Morawski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value in wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at the quality of these earbuds. The case is the charger for the earbuds and magnets keep them in place. There are a variety of sizes for the tips so everyone should find one that fits their ears. The sound is rich and full plus there is good but not great articulation in the highest frequencies. They are there but lack the sparkle found in very expensive wireless earbuds. I am fond of Sennheiser headphones and own the HD600 and HD598. These sound similar. Bass is strong but not overpowering. Bass response is very dependent upon fitting the tips into the ear canal for a solid seal. Highly recommended for the value.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grisham

customer_reviews.title: It looks Gorgeous! And sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a golden color for my girlfriend. When I opened the box, I was amazed by the design. The package, instruction, charger, and earbuds itself looks just gorgeous! I used myself first. Charging is really easy and fast. The sound is very very good. I like the lower bass is powerful. And the vocal is nice and clear when I use it listening to the rap. I used it in the gym. It fits in my ear perfectly. I didn't worry it drops when I was running. And the noise canceling is great. It's also waterproof. My girlfriend likes this gift too. It just looks soo great and fashion. Recommend the golden color.
customer_reviews.author: Leon ZHang

customer_reviews.title: Left one fails to pair reliably. Useless to me.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get the left one to pair even though I have tried all of the suggested fixes. It pairs maybe one of our 15 times. I spend the first 15 minutes using these trying to pair and I usually just switch to a different set of headphones. These are a waste of $100. Buy something else that is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose your case!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with these headphones--good sound quality, true wireless, and a price point that was well below what Apple offered. Unfortunately I lost the charging case, and after checking with customer support I learned that my headphones were effectively useless at that point, because there's a pairing mechanism built into the hardware that prevents you from charging with a new case, and there's no way to charge these without a case. So, despite my initial satisfaction with these, I was ultimately disappointed by a design that left me unable to continue using my otherwise perfectly functional headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Davis C. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Really difficult to get the earbuds to Pair
customer_reviews.text: It’s very difficult to get the earbuds paired with one another and connected via Bluetooth. Every time I use them, I spend several minutes trying to get both earbuds working. Either the R works or the L works, but it’s a challenge getting them to both work at the same time The instructions are poorly written, so they’re not much help. And there’s not good troubleshooting information online.
customer_reviews.author: Busy lady

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, mediocre sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is mediocre at best for this price level, bland lows, mushy mids, and muted highs. My biggest MINUS is that these lose bass-sounds when I open my mouth —maybe they ‘resonate’ through the jawbone??— but it’s a DEAL-BREAKER since that makes up, like, 63% of my dance moves fer-cryin-out-loud! p.s.- the “Rose Gold” is much better described as “Inflamed Flesh”. enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Mustava Dalilai

customer_reviews.title: Great for music and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 1MORE earbuds for their reported musical qualities and they exceeded my expectations substantially. It is a pleasure to listen to music on them. They allow the “air” on a good recording to come through and they reproduce instruments and vocals honestly and without glare or shrillness. Music reproduction is open. They are fairly comfortable and secure in the ear. They have basic phone and playback functions but do not have volume controls, so one must use the controls on the source, but that’s not really a problem. The only negative: I needed very bright light and a magnifying glass to read the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Trash

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Look Cool!
customer_reviews.text: These buds are notoriously known as the go to buds in the $100 range in the tech field so I'm not surprised at how these performed. Comparing them to my $30 tws buds there was a definite difference. Great battery life with the case, they sound pretty balanced with good bass, and they look pretty cool. I'm glad I got the green instead of the black because they definitely stand out. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candid Tech TV

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound for a blue tooth earbud
customer_reviews.text: These are very good sounding for a blue tooth earbud. Better call quality than my previous blue tooth earbuds (Cambridge Melomania). Would have kept them except one or the other would disconnect during phone calls. Tried to update them thru the manufacturers recommended app but could not get the app to recognize the earbuds! Good communication with the manufacturer, they said the pair I got was defective and would have replaced except I didn't purchase thru an authorized dealer. I would try them again or the newer more expensive version with ANC just purchase them thru an authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: plkyduk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, had them for right around 2 weeks and have zero complaints. I'm a musician and consider myself a very low level audiophile. I had given up on wireless ear buds as far as sound quality went, well, guess I was wrong. It's hard to believe that instrument separation, dynamics, and what not could be present in bluetooth earbuds, especially ones at this price, but here they are. They're not as good as my sennheiser over ears of course, but leagues above all the competition in wireless. They last forever on a single charge, look good, they're super comfy, couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: C WeathTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Good Earbuds at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for a little over a week. Once I picked the correct size on the rubber attachments they fit great. They sound awesome. The battery life I have not run into any issue with but I have only run them for about 2.5 hrs max. There is no Noise cancellation other than the blocked sound due to the units being stuffed into your ear. But that's not why I got them. I purchased these based on watching El Jefes reviews on You Tube. I'm not disappointed either. Very nice sound great look good feel good. They are not hurt your ears loud, but they are loud enough for me to be happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, will not stay connected to the source
customer_reviews.text: You must place the music source at least 4 INCHES from the earbuds, or they will randomly disconnect and reconnect. If have my phone in my hand and my hand is not at lease near my chin, the earbuds connect and disconnect. If i place my phone in my shirt pocket it will disconnect and reconnect. If I scratch my ear with my hand, that side's earbud will disconnect. 3 Attempts at geting warrant support failed. you receive a call back from someone in the phillipines that don't speak english well enough to be understood. Only call back was at 4am local time. NO support or warranty available. Do not buy these earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound, but not sure of the steadiness of the connection
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a day, so I'll need to update my review in the coming weeks. My initial experience was that they 'cut out' or drop the connection when I was walking and listening to music. Then the signal remained strong and clear. So I'm not sure how to rate this yet for working out or movement in general. But the sound quality is excellent and they are very comfortable in my ears. At this price, they're worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Waynoworld

customer_reviews.title: Give these a chance if you don’t want to drop the money for Apple earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I’m real picky about how earbuds fit in my ear. I’ve been looking for something wireless and fitting but have had no luck. I was about to break and buy the new Apple earbuds, but I read about these at DigitalTrends.com. Their review convinced me to try them out. The bluetooth aspect can be slightly finicky but not enough to have a complaint. My review is built on only having used them for a week but I recommend giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: JoCo

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved 1more quad drives which made me choose to pick these up. I own a pair of Samsungs true wireless and unfortunately I find that the Samsung sounds better and has never had and connection issues. I've had these cancel in and out every now and then. Pros: Decent for the price Stays in the ear Both left and right can be used individually Cons: Connection issues sometimes, it drops and connects None of the earbud tips completely seals properly Does not sound that great but also isn't that bad.
customer_reviews.author: phillip lam

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive when I had a bad pair!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but only lasted a little over a month of light use (at home) before the right bud stopped accepting a charge and died for good. Going to have to replace them with something more reliable. UPDATE: After my initial review, One More reached out to me and very rapidly sent me a brand new replacement pair (also a return label for my defective pair). Changing my review to reflect the fact that I found these to be solid performers for the price, and to give them the credit they deserve for great customer service. Excellent job, guys.
customer_reviews.author: TatteredKing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these earbuds for nearly a year now and don't know how I'd give them less than 5 stars. Are they the best headphones in the world? I mean, for $99, probably not. But for $99 (and I got them on sale for $50), they're pretty dang awesome. They're secure in my ears, which I could never get from AirPods or most other earbuds I've tried. I could even wear them while I work out. The battery seems to last forever, I charge them very infrequently. The functionality is exactly what I need. They're a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MountaineeringGal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these headphones for a few days now. I am a teacher teaching remotely and wanted some headphones that would be comfortable, have good sound, and not mess up my hair. Lol. These work perfectly. I charge the pod each night with the buds inside. The next morning I take the buds out and then automatically connect to my hp computer. Whenever I have a break like specials or lunch, I put the buds back in the pod to get a mini charge. This way they last all day. Otherwise they go dead after about 2.5 to 3 hours. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Born2inspire

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loves them. Said the sound quality is great, he mostly listens to podcasts and music commuting and at work (not a musician or anything, but an average and frequent listener). No complaints about battery life. He also uses them to talk on the phone and they do a good job with that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to use wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: See friends bought a wireless headset,use very convenient. Not hesitate to follow bought. This appearance I would like very much,smooth circular design,surface vacuum coating process, make the appearance more delicate. Soft silicon tip of ear and type O hooks, can reduce the noise more, with ears more relevant, make the sound more clear, smooth. And very small and easy to carry, fast charger full of one and a half hours alone.Can use more than six hours continuous. Especially this color I am super like, powder, powder, meet the girl of my heart. Practical very convenient also, can clear reception within 10 meters, Very good.And with the device link a follow-up is an automatic link.Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Crona

customer_reviews.title: They won't sync
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I could write a decent review. I loved the quality of these buds for the first few minutes I tried them, but after I updated them on the 1more app I cannot seem to get them to pair to each other. I can only have 1 bud or the other playing, not both at the same time. I just spent about 2 hours wasting my life trying to fix these things and am so aggravated I wanna throw them out a window right now. I've done everything in the guide and everything I've found online and nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have tested and purchase many TWE , and I can honestly say these are one of the best ones out there, the price is good , battery life excellent, the sound is as good as or better than the Beats , Jaybird and Bose, they are louder than most TWE a bit less that the Sony's, They are a good fit in the ear, easy to pair and they can be use independently from each other don't need to have both of them on to listen to music, the only Con I have with these TWE is the lack of touch control , no controls to control the vol, or skip track,besides that they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality earbusds
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks and feels premium about this earbuds right from the packaging Light weight and comfotable.you wont feel like you are wearing a earbud lot of buds are provided to fit ones ear Nice Bass and clear sound Good range for earbuds . Bluetooth 5.0 and Aptx features are good to have Quick charging feature is great would have loved to see a lcd indicator on amount of charge left in the case Case is sturdy but easily catches smudge Noise isolation is jut ok USB C seems to be missing which is a big negative.
customer_reviews.author: Samjina

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Look, I love my 1More triple driver earbuds. LOVE them. But these wireless ones are straight trash. They worked for about a week, and then the left earbud started disconnecting at random and now will not hold a charge. Updated the firmware via the 1More app (which is buggy as hell, believe the bad reviews) and it did not solve the problem. I'm returning these today. So disappointed in 1More.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: Overall these were great for entertainment purposes such as listening to music, or watching videos. The battery life, and the connectivity range we're just as promised. My only issue with it was that there was a delay using the Galaxy assistant on my j7 phone, as well as a delay while using GPS maps. This was a problem for me because I intended to use them during my commute as a hands-free option to my phone. But it turned out to be a bit more of a distraction then a help since I had to check it was actually doing what I requested.
customer_reviews.author: ke shili

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, very good fidelity, could be louder
customer_reviews.text: These are my first wireless of any sort, so am not sure how loud they should be, but they are no where near as loud as my wired ear buds. This may be normal, but I wish they had just a little more volume. The sound is very good, nice base and definition for the price, fit well, and the charge is awesome! Nice case to boot.
customer_reviews.author: 78Foxes

customer_reviews.title: WOW... Very Nice headset
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT. They come with 3 different size tips to help them fit MOST ears, Sadly they do not fit my TINY ears (I truly wish they did) BUT they will make a great gift. The sound clear and have no delay. You can connect either one individually to the phone OR both for stereo sound. They come with a sturdy and stylish case for storing AND charging them on the go (it holds a charge too). You will not be disappointed with the quality OR the sound. I definitely would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking - BUY THESE NOW.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and good base too! Long battery life and easy recharge in the case. Tricky to keep in the ear sometimes unless I use the largest adapter and wedge them in just right. Glad I finally found the right solution after buying too many other useless earbuds. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ikaju

customer_reviews.title: Takes an amazing beating.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for hands free phone, music and audio books. Good battery life. The reason I'm writing this review because I lost the left ear piece. I found it a week later when I was folding laundry. It went through 80 minutes in the washing machine and 60 minutes high heat in the dryer. It charged right up and is working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, easy to use, some trouble on calls
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for listening to audio books and for that they are great. The battery life is exceptional. I tend to wear one at a time. After several hours they do start to bother my ear, but I just switch it out for the other ear. I also switched to the smallest ear insert (there are 4 sizes) and that helped. The only issue, which may be related to using only one at a time, is that I have had issues taking a call: disconnecting from the phone, problems with the other person hearing me and a spotty connection. Four stars for battery life, look, ease of use. Not five stars because of phone call issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, long battery, not super secure
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life and you can use each bud on its own. So you could technically get 12 hours of continuous usage if you use one bud and charge the other. Sound quality is very good IMO. Microphone for voice calls is decent, not outstanding. Magnetic battery charger. Does not support two devices at once, but a long button press will allow you to switch reliably and quickly between devices. Not a super secure fit for my canyon canals.
customer_reviews.author: SRHadden

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earbuds about five months ago and almost immediately had issues with them. While they stayed in my ears and were sound cancelling, the sound that came from the earbuds was so quiet that when the volume was completely up, almost no sound came out. On top of that, there were times that only one earbud would connect or sound only came out of one. Additionally, I got the 1more app and updated my earbuds. This did almost nothing. Today I bought $15 Bluetooth earbuds from the store and the sound quality and volume is multitudes of times better than these earbuds. I urge you, please do not buy these! They are a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stormoen

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in the morning, I have to say it's much better than what I expected, the quality is very good. And the pairing process turns out to be pretty easy, so I have to give credits to it. It has the play/pause button on it, which is very convenient. And the sound quality is not bad too. I've been using it for more than 3 days, most of the time I would use it in the gym, and it eliminated the noise a lot. It definitely worths the money, I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are easily the best headphones I have used. Sound quality is excellent. Noise cancellation is excellent, used these on a flight and could not hear any of the ambient noise during the flight. Battery life was longer than my previous wireless headphones. Set up was very simple and straight forward. I have been using these non-stop since receiving them and could not be happier with the quality. Fits into ears great without any discomfort. Volume is strong, however, high volume is not needed since the noise cancelling works so good. Charges quickly. I intend on buying another set for family member.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound pretty good for earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The key words are "for earbuds." If you come from open-back headphones, then these will sound very "closed" at first. After getting used to the sound, they are better. I can hear instruments well, and they don't sound totally jumbled together. I think that if they put more money into the earbuds instead of the packaging (which, don't get me wrong, was very cool), then the sound would have room to be even better. They also don't isolate all that much noise with the buds they come with, which might change if better/other ones are put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time for running and biking and they are great! The recharging case is super convenient. The battery life is great.These buds are also great by staying in your ears, as you travel on a bike or scooter these will stay in if placed correctly. The convenience of true wireless is so nice, and the sound quality is very good. All in all I am pleased with the purchase and would purchase them again. They fit securely in your ear. Light and comfortable. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: These earbuds make you wish you had gotten airpods
customer_reviews.text: They disconnect from each other too frequently. The power button does not work well to resolve connection issues, and I often find myself needing to put them back into the charger and take them out again in order to regain connection. An obnoxiously loud voice relays the battery level whenever they are taken out of their case. They just don't have a premium feel. As an owner, it's embarrassing....
customer_reviews.author: G$

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sounds Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these earbuds! I purchased them in black and they look sleek and you can feel the quality. They fit snug in my ears and come with different size attachments for a custom fit. Very easy to set up. I listened to music on my iPhone and it sounded so crisp and clear! And the sound was just as good on phone calls even when we were whispering. Amazing! There is one button for easy answer and hang up. And even when I went to the other side of the house the call didn't get dropped. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L

customer_reviews.title: Still Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I was given the chance to retry these wireless earbuds. The new style of tips I was asked to try DO hold them in your ear much better and are comfortable, but once again I can say that the sound is less than stellar. I noticed that these do not go into the ear far enough to improve the sound. Very tinny. My wired earbuds have much richer sound than these. I would say true wireless may be a problem that way in general. but I am not impressed with these. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, DO NOT UPDATE FIRMWARE
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these and the iPhone app for it recommended a firmware update, after updating each earbud, they no longer connect together , you can only listen to one earbud or the other, totally ruined my experience with these earbuds, I highly recommend doing more research... the company's help and support is completely useless as well, I have received no help and discovered I am not the only person with this problem and missed other reviews about it. do yourself a favor and spend more money on a more reliable earbud source that actually works, like the samsung plus, or apple airpods, brand name reliability goes a long way vs price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Hits the quality-vs-value nail in the head!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first set of true wireless earbuds so I really can’t compare with others, but I am truly impressed by them: they are as good – or better than – all my other earbuds, wired or linked-wireless. The bass quality is obviously a standout among others. Actually, they are so good that I use them to lesson to musics instead of plugging in my $300 Sennheiser wired headphone. The sound qualities are so close that it is well worth the trade-off for wireless freedom. I think among all these cheapo and “boutique” TWL earbuds, this set hits the quality-vs-value nail in the head.
customer_reviews.author: cal777

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds. I like that you click the button on each bud instead of touch control. This helps to place the bud in ear more solid with out messing up controls while using. Sound canceling not great. But over all sound quality is excellent. And they are stylish and look great. This is my 3rd pair. I started with a cheap pair around 20 dollars then bought a 50 dollar pair then these at 100 dollars. The old adage is true every time .. you get what you pay for. Am happy with price and product. I would recommend these if you can afford a great pair of buds for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Returned because they fell out of my ears
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price, sound, battery life, storage case and ease of Bluetooth connection capabilities. I ended up returning them because I found a set of headphones that were better suited for running and bike riding. They fell out of my ears on a run. They also stuck out of my ears and that wasn't great. The headphones I chose were fit better and have bone conduction technology so I can hear my surroundings while exercising and fit more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Semple

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Performance since Firmware Updated
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 5 months now and really thought they were a great deal until recently. I think the sound quality is excellent for the price and the jazz that I listen to most sounds clean and clear on them. I don't have a need for a heavy bass and glad they don't have that. Unfortunately I updated the firmware using the 1MORE Music App and while that gave me volume controls (nice feature), I'm now getting sound distortions about every 20 seconds, little blurps that interrupt the flow of the talk or music. It's really distracting. I would discourage you from using that app until they fix that bug (it's version 0.40.00 that's causing the trouble).
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Better then Apple AirPods
customer_reviews.text: Been using Apple AirPods but hate how they fall out of your ear. Don’t have that problem here! A friend recommended these and they are amazing. Better sound quality and they fit my ear perfectly. I’ve had issues where similar products fit the ear but after a while start to hurt. Don’t have that issue with these. Recharging case is nice though I have yet to kill the battery in these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gafter

customer_reviews.title: Best in the price range by far
customer_reviews.text: EDIT 11/27/2019: I keep having battery problems with one of them, to the point that it's getting rather annoying, so I'm knocking off another star. Pros: - Really good sound quality and form factor - Easy to use, easy to charge - Great price point Neutral: - Difficult to get a good seal but can be done - Sometimes Bluetooth doesn't reliably connect to new devices Cons: - Battery is much less than advertised, and one of the earbuds has significantly less battery life than the other. - No volume control
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Fall out easily when working out
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay in place as well as advertised when working out. The left one falls out more often but that could be my ear's fault! They do come with extra size rubber pieces but they still just dont fit in my ears that well. The case needs to be right side up in order to charge the bus. I had it in my bag and it was inverted and one did not charge. Ok for the price but I would look for ones that hold better in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Juju2335

customer_reviews.title: If your considering airpods Don't, try these.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability these have to reproduce low end and highs like most cheap earbuds can't but these sounds very similar to my 1More triple driver iems, lacking a bit of the superior separation you get from 3 separate drivers but still worth it. only complaint is the magnet that holds them in the case isn't strong enough so if your doing anything more than walking randomly the other bud will make the bell sound. Bluetooth 5 makes these connect to any modern phone snappy and faultless.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Great value earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I will simply say that for the price you'll be hard pressed to find better earbuds than this. I've tried a couple of other vendors and always walked away disappointed because of the frequent connection drops while walking outside the house, questionable sound quality and slow charging: not with these. 4 stars because you can't control volume of device and the app is very basic: I wish it would allow me to configure some aspects of the behavior... turn off the annoying blue blinking lights anyone? They have audible clues when they pair, why you need the blinking lights is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: yahr

customer_reviews.title: amazing sounding earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: They could’ve easily made these much more expensive. they sound like any other expensive brand i usually have a hard time keeping any type of earphone in but these stayed in and not have fallen out my ear once! i love how fast they charge and how long the battery life last, not to mention is does come with a case! they price is basically a steal!
customer_reviews.author: kiti

customer_reviews.title: I have every color
customer_reviews.text: I love anything aqua and these are gorgeous and very stylish Sound amazing they get petty loud, battery holds forever I wear them every day and had them about a month before I had to charge. Had some trouble at first getting them to fit with the ear wings but I just twisted until they felt right, never fell out so far.
customer_reviews.author: 💙💵💙

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyy better than the Galaxy Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Found this on a list by Wired called "Top 10 must have items." I have tried several pairs of earbud Bluetooths, including the Apple pods and Galaxy Earbuds, before trying this one and as picky as I am... I have not noticed anything that does not work properly, nor any design flaws. Seriously! That is saying something. Oh yeah, and they are a better price. Highly recommend. The noise cancelling feature is incredible. They pair up easily; separately and easily still. There are 4, count em!, 4 colors to pick from, and these will not be falling out of your ears or hanging up on people while adjusting thanks to a tiny button located perfectly atop. I LOVE THESE EARBUDS
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of ear buds, despite no documentation, 1st thing I did after unpacking is to insert earbuds into little charging station, red light came on, several hours later there was no light, so I assume they're charged. The units paired quite easily and selected through my bluetooth. The sound these little units puts out is pretty awesome. These earbuds produce quality sound. Once i started listening to music, it was hours later before I stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great! Everything about the sound quality noise cancellation awesome ! The only trouble I’m having is they don’t stay in my ears. They slip out. I’m walking and talking and before I know it it falls right out. At least for me. Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: roccobilly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earbuds. Truly happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 2 weeks now and I must say that it is very comfortable and it fits my ears perfectly with the right silicone tip and hook. I listen to music for hours and experienced no discomfort or falling of earbuds whatsoever. The built is quite premium of the earbuds as well the case and the sound quality is amazing, the sound quality feels like the 1 more stylish cost more than 99 dollars. The battery life is great only need to charge once a week. The only con I have with this earbuds is that it has micro-usb charging instead of usb type c.
customer_reviews.author: James Aropol Aruelo

customer_reviews.title: So Sad...
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and sound great...they just did not stay in my ears and I could not get them to fully “fill” my ear as with my AirPods. I kept trying to push them in further to get a sealed feeling. I honestly couldn’t believe that a product with no fitting options (AirPods) gave me a better fit than the 1Mores. And I tried all of the various eartip/o ring combos it came with. I don’t see how people could exercise with these and them stay in. My son is trying them out right now but sadly...they’re probably going back.
customer_reviews.author: stass

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for almost a month, I would give 6stars if possible. Very nice looking design, fits comfortably in my ears, build quality definitely give me the premium feeling. Battery last full 4 hours per charge. Sound quality is good for music, noise canceling works for my conference calls very well. For a not well known brand the price is not cheap, but I found it worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Fu Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality, comfort and value!
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome! Pair with my Galaxy S8+ as soon as I take them out of the case before I can get them in my ears. Sound quality is super subjective, but these sounds great to me. Very dynamic with tight bass and smooth soaring highs. Battery life is excellent. Very comfortable even when wearing for several hours. I forget they are in. Stay snug while jogging and lifting. Don't hesitate. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect, don’t fall out while exercising, sound quality is great. These are some of the best earbuds I've used to date.I dont leave the house without them. They work exactly as advertised. The battery life is what I expected. If you are still undecided, give it a try - you won't regret! Worth every penny. I've recommended these to friends and they love them just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use for conference calls at work as I have returned to the office, but most of our company is still working from home. I had done some research and purchased these because of the mic quality and compatibility in Androids. They work great and the battery life is fantastic. I also really like that each ear bud can work independently. Great purchase and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great compact true wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about buying these since they weren’t on any of the lists I was looking at during my research. However, I’m glad I did. The quality of sound is really good. Of course you have to have the buds fitting nicely in your ear for the passive noise cancellation to be effective, but the four sizes of bud squishy and three sizes of hook part are very helpful with that. So far the battery has lasted me an entire multi-hour study session. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I use these EVERY DAY! Really pretty color, and super comfortable fit. I can run and jump and hike without having to worry about them falling out. The sound quality is great, noise cancelling as well, so if someone is trying to get your attention, you wont hear it, with that being said, be aware of your surroundings! I am super satisfied. Ive used them every day since delivery, which is around 45 days. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Jesh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after the stellar reviews
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. But starting from the first week it had issue in pairing the left bud. I had to put it back in dock to get reconnected. Still happens intermittently. After 2.5 months the left bud button is completely depressed in. So it doesnt click anymore. I can turn it off only after pressing really hard on it. Extremely disappointed. I need to contact the company for an exchange. Will update once I hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Illuminati

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - not great Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: These sound phenomenal and work great but as of recent, my devices only connect to the right ear bud and never the left. Selecting the device in the Bluetooth settings doesn't help. I have to manually make my devices forget the ear buds then re-sync them to my phone/computer/etc. It's happening so frequently that I no longer use them. Shame as they sound really really good
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for music when working, fit great, sound great.
customer_reviews.text: I like to listen to music while I weld sometimes and these have excellent sound quality and surprisingly good noise cancellation. They fit perfect in my ears and aren't so bulky that they bump my welding hood. I work in a very loud factory with a loud AC TIG welder and the sound over powers the surrounding noise with surprising ease. The sound quality is also so good that putting these in was like listening to my music for new for the first time again! Definitely a night and day difference compared to the crappy 25$ pair I got on Amazon a few months back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! My Apple headphones hurt my ears so bad because they’re hard AF. These have those squishy rubbery inserts that feel like jello in your ears. The sound is also really good because they almost like suction to the inside of your ear. They come with a handful of extra pieces in case you lose any too! The charging case is extra convenient for those long travel days. I made my dad try them and he was so impressed and trust me, he needs the best of the best of literally everything. I’ll definitely be buying these as gifts. I highly recommend. The price is amazing, too. The perfect gift come holiday season!
customer_reviews.author: psfdeng

customer_reviews.title: Can't use them if they won't stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged when it arrived. The earbuds seemed to be in working order so I decided to give them a try. The buds did not fit my ears no matter what eartips or hooks I tried. I planned to use them to listen to sleep sounds in bed so I wasn't doing any moving around and they still fell out so nope! It's a shame because it does have decent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Above The Rim

customer_reviews.title: No volume control
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for use with my phone, but unfortunately they don't have their own volume control. So you can't really pair these with a smart television as those devices rely on the headset for volume control. I should have looked closer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you're going to clip onto yourself
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds themselves worked great my complaint is with the charger case it came in. It did not close securely! Within 1 week, I LOST my earbuds because the case opened without me knowing and the insurance does NOT cover lost or stolen property. I am still pissed that I LOST $80 of my money on a faulty case. I wouldn't buy because for convenience sake, when you purchase a case to clip in onto your person or purse, the case can and will open and you will be out of a set of earbuds and the money you paid for them. I will never purchase, with my own money, from them ever again. I truly learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking junk
customer_reviews.text: Nice wireless earbuds... when they work. They spontaneously unpaid, for no apparent reason. Then, they refuse to re-pair. Sometimes, they'll magically start working again. Too expensive for nice-looking junk. Also, my ears are really small and none of the adapters improved the fit. I use my Jaybird Vistas (which were normally reserved for running/exercise) more since these are unreliable. :-/
customer_reviews.author: LadyBoSS

customer_reviews.title: Best audio quality TWS earbuds under $150.
customer_reviews.text: Just as the title states, these are close to perfect. They sound clean, loud, and have plenty of bass. It really feels like you are at a concert as opposed to listening to these tiny buds. They work great for calls as well so these are ideal to use for calls and meetings. In another note, I have had to contact customer service and they are amazing. Can’t wait to get the ANv
customer_reviews.author: Sally Roscher

customer_reviews.title: Value for money true wireless bluetooth ear pod.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Sound quality - crisp, clear sound delivery. Bass sound quality is distinct even if not booming. 2. Battery life - sustainable for more than 4 hours of usage that even lasts overnight if you leave it on standby. 3. Bluetooth connectivity distance - more than 10 feet away with no distortion being perceived. Cons: 1. No unit volume control - can't increase the limited volume level of the source device.
customer_reviews.author: warmbodynightowl

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are awesome! Sound quality is outstanding. Comfort and fit are 1st rate. Range is much greater than any other Bluetooth device I’ve ever seen. You can spend a bunch more money for buds but all you get is a lighter bank account. I’ll update this in 6 months if I find anything you should know But for now you need these!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but a bit gaudy in appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound and fit. The external earbuds do look like the product photos but when you see them in real life (especially on a Zoom meeting) they appear as very shiny ear jewelry (and often elicit remarks from the other viewers). The tiny on-bud controls are OK but are not intuitive. The charging case works well. Mostly used for You Tube, Zoom and music.
customer_reviews.author: pilose

product_meta.title: 1MORE Stylish True Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth 5.0, 24-Hour Playtime, Stereo In-Ear Headphones with Charging Case, Built-in Microphone, Alternate Pairing Mode
product_meta.description: Color:Black1MORE True Wireless Enjoy Your Music Life Bluetooth 5.0: Bringing a faster transmission, stronger anti-interference, and a more stable connection. Premium Sound Quality: Designed for compact earbuds, the 7mm dynamic driver with a titanium composite diaphragm balances powerful bass and exquisite detail. It reproduces crystal clear sound in an ultra-compact design for enhanced efficiency. Expertly Tuned Sound: Tuned by Grammy winning sound engineer Luca Bignardi for a fully balanced and precise sound stage. aptX/AAC Technology: aptX superior bluetooth codec initiates Android sound potential;AAC high speed transmission and crystal clear sound quality for iOS. Up to 24 Hours of Playtime: 6.5 hours of playtime when earbuds fully charged, 24 hours with the charging case. One-Step Pairing: Life P2 true wireless earbuds automatically connect with the last paired device. Comfortable Fit: 3 additional pairs of ear tips with different sizes are included so you can get the right fit. Note: Check the video above for instructions on how to use and reset 1MORE TWS. Please kindly note that we already got new eartips, which is different from thoes in the package. If you like, we would like to arrange a pack for you for free. Specifications Model: E1026BT-I Color: Black / Gold / Green / Pink Headphone Weight (Single): 6.2 g Product Weight: 52.8 g Case Size: 68*40*38 mm Input: 5V 1A Impedance: 16 Ω Wireless Range: 10 m Bluetooth Codec: aptX / AAC / SBC Bluetooth Protocol: HFP / A2DP / AVRCP Headphone Charging Time: 85 mins Case Charging Time: 85 mins
feature_bullets: Premium Sound Dynamic driver with a titanium composite diaphragm balances powerful bass and exquisite details for a natural and authentic sound

24-Hour Playtime with Fast Charge Enjoy an uninterrupted playtime of 6 5 hours on a single charge and extend it to 24 hours with the charging case Quick Charge feature enables 15-minute charging time to fuel up an additional 3 hours of enjoyment
Fast and Stable Connection An optimized Qualcomm chip with aptX and AAC (Advanced Audio Codec) compatibility achieves a rock-solid connection delivering music without dropouts as you unwind and relax

Snug and Secure Fit Ergonomically designed earbuds with 45°oblique-angled nozzles lay in your ear canals comfortably and safely, 3 additional pairs of ear tips with different sizes are included so you can get the right fit

Expert sound Tuning Luca Bignardi 1more’s in-house Grammy Award Winning Sound Engineer tunes all 1MORE headphones for a precise representation of the artist’s intended sound These sleek earbuds offer the perfect blend of premium sound & design

Groovy Colorways 4 color options available to match your personal style thanks to the NCVM (Non-Conductive Vacuum Metallization) color process which provides both long-lasting colors and sleek metallic finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,692 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
